name: Supermarket 2021
description:
Summary :

It is the year 2021, COVID-19 is still around and doing well, sales of toilet paper are still rising. You are an employee of a supermarket. You have been doing your job pretty well ever since you started. But today a new challenge await. In order to protect you and your clients your employer has installed a new piece of equipment on your checkout system. 

Instructions : 

Scan the items that comes on the conveyor, then manage to get them to the client's basket without touching any walls.  

You get 3 chances before you are fired, make the most of it. 

Every client has 5 items, every time a new client come you get an extra chance with a maximum of 3 !

Hope y'all enjoy that little piece of software !
